page.title: 19Leisure Centre (cont)
page.content: These are the rules of the Centre: { No black shoes in the hall. { No scarves on the rink. { No outdoor shoes in the hall { No sweets or drinks in the hall. The most popular sports that the people we interviewed played or liked were{football, badminton and snooker. People told us they would like a {swimming pool}next to the Leisure Centre and{tennis courts}next to Tates Supermarket on the spare ground.Two people wanted an{ice skating}rink on one side of the hall. Just about all the people went once a week in a group. Hardly anybody we interviewed went to the{Grimsby {Leisure Centre. (Written by Daniel Walton and Stephen Hancocks)
